Text: Enerplus Corp (NYSE:ERF) Announces $0.01 Monthly Dividend Daily Ratings & News for Enerplus Complete the form below to receive the latest headlines and analysts' recommendations for Enerplus with our free daily email newsletter:  Enerplus Corp (NYSE:ERF) (TSE:ERF) announced a monthly dividend on Tuesday, August 20th, NASDAQ reports. Investors of record on Friday, August 30th will be given a dividend of 0.008 per share by the oil and natural gas company on Monday, September 16th. This represents a $0.10 dividend on an annualized basis and a dividend yield of 1.31%.
